date.description: The date of the report data

startDate.description: The start date of the report period

endDate.description: The end date of the report period

campaignId.description: The unique identifier of the campaign

campaignBudgetAmount.description: The budget amount set for the campaign

campaignBudgetType.description: The type of budget for the campaign

campaignBudgetCurrencyCode.description: The currency code for the campaign budget

adGroupId.description: The unique identifier of the ad group (when grouped by ad group)

adGroupName.description: The name of the ad group (when grouped by ad group)

adStatus.description: The status of the ad group (when grouped by ad group)

impressions.description: Number of times your ads were shown

clicks.description: Number of clicks on your ads

purchases1d.description: Number of purchases within 1 day of ad interaction

purchases7d.description: Number of purchases within 7 days of ad interaction

purchases14d.description: Number of purchases within 14 days of ad interaction

purchases30d.description: Number of purchases within 30 days of ad interaction

sales1d.description: Sales value within 1 day of ad interaction

sales7d.description: Sales value within 7 days of ad interaction

sales14d.description: Sales value within 14 days of ad interaction

sales30d.description: Sales value within 30 days of ad interaction

unitsSoldClicks1d.description: Units sold within 1 day of clicks

unitsSoldClicks7d.description: Units sold within 7 days of clicks

unitsSoldClicks14d.description: Units sold within 14 days of clicks

unitsSoldClicks30d.description: Units sold within 30 days of clicks

topOfSearchImpressionShare.description: Share of impressions in top of search results

addToList.description: Number of add to list actions

campaignBiddingStrategy.description: The bidding strategy used for the campaign

spend.description: Total spend for the campaign/ad group

timeUnit.description: The time unit for the report data
